Weaver/pkg/backend/registry.go.description: Backend Registry pattern: Uses map[string]Backend with sync.RWMutex. Methods: NewRegistry(), Register(), Get(), List(), Available(ctx), Status(ctx). Key pattern: copies map before releasing lock during I/O operations.

Yarn/session.go.description: Session struct with ID, Name, Description, StartedAt, EndedAt, Config, Metadata. Contains Conversations and Measurements. Has internal sync.RWMutex. Methods: NewSession(), AddConversation(), AddMeasurement(), ActiveConversation(), End(), Stats(), Export()

Yarn/registry.go.description: GetOrCreate() method returns existing session (bool=false) or creates new one (bool=true). Uses write lock for atomic check-and-create operation. Common pattern for idempotent session retrieval.
